comments:
I was testing bug 118949, and received the following NFE. I can't reproduce in my target:

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Project\build.xml"
	at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:63)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:542)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntThread.buildStack(AntThread.java:332)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.antsupport.logger.AntProcessDebugBuildLogger.getStackFrames(AntProcessDebugBuildLogger.java:194)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntDebugTarget.getStackFrames(AntDebugTarget.java:419)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntThread.getStackFrames0(AntThread.java:94)
	at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.debug.model.AntThread.getStackFrames(AntThread.java:81)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.elements.adapters.ThreadTreeContentAdapter.getChildren(ThreadTreeContentAdapter.java:26)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.AsynchronousTreeContentAdapter.computeChildren(AsynchronousTreeContentAdapter.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.AsynchronousTreeContentAdapter$1.run(AsynchronousTreeContentAdapter.java:39)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

I think the interesting thing here will be the setup of the environment and the specifics of the buildfile.

Somehow a location or string being passed across the wire is marshalled incorrectly and a string is in the position I am looking for a line number.
We will reopen when we can repeat.
